page.title: 17Leisure in Holbury
page.content: {Analysis of Leisure Activities:} Gardening{33%}Reading{28%}Walking{ 15% Knitting{ 12%}Angling{10%}D.I.Y { 9% Embroidary{8%}Swimming{7%}Golf { 7% Computers{ 6%}Sports{ 6%}Badminton{4% Squash{ 4%}Football{3%}Snooker{ 3% Camping { 2%}Cooking{ 2%}CB Radio{ 2% Cycling { 2%}Sailing{ 2%}Keep Fit{ 2% Motoring{ 2%}Writing{2%}photography{2% Resting{ 2%}Voluntary work{2%}Darts{2% Decorating{1%}Dancing{ 1%}Gym{ 1% Drawing{ 1%}Dressmaking{1%}Drinking{1% { We also discovered that 91% take {holidays away from home every year. 63% take 1 holiday 25% take 2 holidays 3% take 3 holidays 9% take no holidays In the last 5 years { 38%}took 1-2 holidays abroad { 6%} took 3-4 holidays abroad { 4%} took 5-6 holidays abroad Gangwarily Leisure Centre is under construction.
